en: If you can switch lives with someone, who would it be?
ko: 너 인생 다른 사람 삶이랑 바꿀 수 있으면 누구랑 바꿀래?

en: I would change lives with Warren Buffett.
He is extremely good at investing.
In addition, he is very influential.
But my main reason is because he is a philanthropist.
ko: 근데 무엇보다도 그 분이 자선사업가여서 바꿔 살고 싶어

en: He plans to donate the majority of his money to the society when he passes.
ko: 돌아가셨을 때 재산 대부분을 사회에 환원한다고 하시더라고

en: I would love to help people in need just like he does.
ko: 나도 그 분처럼 도움이 필요한 사람들을 돕고 싶어
